description.raw:
As far as I know we're not introducing noise in the commands that the teams send for moving the robots.

In `SetAngularVelocity()` (and in the case of a fixed wing), we were using the observed linear velocity to compute the new angular velocity to be applied to the robot. The observed linear velocity has noise, hence we were applying some noise to `SetAngularVelocity()`.

This pull request eliminates the potential noise from `SetAngularVelocty()`.
